full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA GCIG MKHA' 'GRO SNYAN BRGYUD KYI YUM CHEN MO'I MKHA' 'GRO ZHI KHRO LA RTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR SHIN TU MDOR BSDUS LAS BZHI 'DOD 'JO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
